title: WHy Cant I Buy Braum from the dicount shop
body: I went to the discount shop to buy Braum + lionheart skin but it say error pls help me!

replies.body: I think this has to do with Braum being on sale in the regular shop right now but once that ends your personal shop should work correctly.
This is the 2nd time I've seen someone report this error.  To get a better idea as to what is going on, could you provide me a screenshot of the exact error you receive?
